meta.title: Economic Integration Framework - Global Governance Framework
meta.description: A comprehensive framework for creating equitable, sustainable, and interconnected economic systems that support both local sovereignty and global cooperation

guideCard.title: New to the Economic Integration Framework?
guideCard.description: Start with one of our simplified guides that explain the core concepts for different audiences.

overview.title: Economic Integration Framework
overview.subtitle: Overview
overview.paragraph1: The Economic Integration Framework provides a comprehensive governance architecture to create equitable, sustainable, and interconnected economic systems that support both local sovereignty and global cooperation.
overview.paragraph2: This framework integrates local, regional, and global approaches through innovative mechanisms such as community currencies, ethical trade zones, adaptive universal basic income, and commons governance to transform economic challenges into opportunities for shared prosperity.
